abstracts.cdata!:
Through the strengthening of existing
            food crops extension services in nine Provinces, the
            National Food Crops Extension Project will provide for:
            introduction of a sound extension methodology with emphasis
            on continuous training and regular farm visits; construction
            or renovation of 529 Rural Extension Centers (RECs); an
            increase in the number of extension staff; an extensive
            program of local training for extension workers along with a
            limited number of fellowships and overseas training tours;
            employment of a local firm of architects, an extension
            specialist, extension of IRRI rice research contract, and
            about 50 man-months of short-term specialists; and
            procurement of vehicles and equipment.
